home.Description: Systems Engineering student | Interested in cybersecurity and project management.

about-me.Description2: I am a Systems Engineering student, currently in my 8th semester at the National University of Engineering. I am interested in cybersecurity because of the challenge of protecting critical systems against emerging threats. Project management allows me to lead teams and turn ideas into real solutions. I also see in data science an opportunity to generate valuable insights that support strategic decision-making.

experience.title1: Participant in Project Fair - National University of Engineering
experience.des1: Presented a project to improve automation in the current Faculty Selection Process.

proyects.des1: Automation and Digitalization of the Faculty Selection Process.
